items.sentence: Tom is more worried about Mary than her parents are.
I don't know how you put up with your mother-in-law.
I'll tell Tom why Mary doesn't want to go to Boston.
Tom didn't tell Mary that he'd spent time in prison.
Tom said that he thought that his house was haunted.
The company claims that the delay was unintentional.
Tom tried to steady himself by grabbing the railing.
Tom tried his utmost to get Mary to change her mind.
Tom's mother lies awake at night worrying about him.
This is one of the worst movies that I've ever seen.
